item.title: DotNetNuke Directory Traversal Vulnerability (CVE-2020-8593)
item.description: CVE: CVE-2020-8593 Vendor: DNN Software (https://www.dnnsoftware.com/, https://dnncommunity.org/) Product: DotNetNuke, DNN Platform Version Affected: <= 9.4.x Fixed Version: 9.5.0 Description: “The DNN Platform is a free and open source product you can download today and create powerful websites with.” The DNN Platform’s administrative panel provides a File Manager component which is vulnerable to directory traversal. Attackers can upload a specially crafted zip file which when extracted, allows navigation outside of the File Manager defined Root.
